page.title: 14WESTWOODSIDE SCHOOL TRUSTEES
page.content: The{School Trustees}are a group of people who live in the Parish of Haxey and Westwoodside. The{Trustee}were founded as part of a Charitable Trust after the building of Westwoodside School in 1885. This body was to provide finance, books, teachers etc. the two Parish schools, and is still existing today. Finance is obtained from invested land rents and although Humberside C.C.E.A. administer Westwoodside School help from the{Trustees}still takes the latter form. Bibles are presented by{Trustees each year to the fourth year pupils of W.W.S. and Haxey schools. {Trustee}members inclulde the vicar of Haxey, and members of the Parish Council. Other persons residing or carrying out business in the parish may be elected for life as a{Trustee.
